message:
Very Helpful, Thanks!  

The amount of undocumentation in msdn these days is staggering.  

LOL - I have a text document with a boilerplate complaint that I paste into the 'did you find this helpful' area at the bottom of the msdn doc page. I have used it often (understatement)  

My complaint:  

MORE UNDOCUMENTATION. When we come to this page, we are looking for information and examples not a restatement of the method name in sentence form.  

WILL SOMEONE PLEASE ADDRESS THIS PROBLEM. A LARGE AMOUNT OF MSDN DOCUMENTATION IS JUST LIKE THIS..
